body.p: HPE Helion CloudSystem delivers an enterprise private cloud in HPE Converged Infrastructure environments. HPE Helion CloudSystem is available as standalone software that supports a multiple vendor hardware environment or as an integrated infrastructure with HPE ConvergedSystem.
Helion CloudSystem 9.0 Update 1 is a patch kit that is applied to an existing installation of Helion CloudSystem 9.0. You can obtain the update from the Software Depot.
HPE Helion CloudSystem consists of two offerings.

li.p: HPE Helion CloudSystem Foundation is based on the HPE Helion OpenStack distribution of OpenStack cloud software and includes Helion Development Platform and DNS as a Service.

HPE Helion CloudSystem Enterprise expands on CloudSystem Foundation through the addition of HPE Cloud Service Automation and HPE Operations Orchestration. CloudSystem Enterprise automates the integration of servers, storage, networking, security, and monitoring capabilities throughout the infrastructure service delivery lifecycle of a virtualized data center.

body.p: HPE Helion CloudSystem Enterprise offers additional design tools and provider integration, including OpenStack, HPE OneView, and Amazon Web Services through HPE Helion Eucalyptus. With the Marketplace Portal, users have secure access to these services.

section.title: Documentation Library
section.p: The HPE Helion CloudSystem Documentation Library provides the most up-to-date version of CSA documents available on the HPE Software Support Portal. The table below shows all documents released to support the HPE Helion CloudSystem 9.0 Update 1 release..

row.entry: Backup-as-a-Service with HP Helion CloudSystem Enterprise: Integrating HP LiveVault Service with OpenStack technology
Backup-as-a Service with HP Helion CloudSystem Enterprise: Integrating HP LiveVault Service with Cloud Service Automation
Configuring HP CloudSystem to Use an HP Operations Orchestration Remote Action Server (RAS)

section.title: Additional Information
section.p: To check for recent updates or to verify that you are using the most recent edition of a document, go to: https://softwaresupport.hp.com
section.note: If you have reached this library, you have already signed in with your HPE Passport credentials. You can also receive updated documentation if you subscribe to the appropriate product support service. Contact your HPE sales representative for details. See Document Change Notes within the document for a list of any revisions.

section.title: Support
section.p: You can visit the HPE Software Support web site at: https://softwaresupport.hp.com/

This web site provides contact information and details about the products, services, and support that HPE offers. Most of the support areas require that you register as an HPE Passport user and sign in. Many also require an active support contract. To find more information about support access levels, go to:
To register for an HPE Passport ID, go to: https://ovrd.external.hp.com/rd/register
